title: Hold The Door
description: Live from the espnW Women + Sports Summit, Cari Champion sits down with Chief Brand Officer of Uber Bozoma Saint John to discuss her journey to the top and the challenge of holding the door open for other opportunities for women.
itunes:title: Hold The Door
itunes:author: ESPN, ESPNW, Cari Champion
